title: Use more-permissive ValidBooleanFalse in Culture tasks
body:
Before, we were explicitly comparing to 'false', but usually MSBuild
allows alternate spellings, which we can pretty easily support here.

commit.message:
Use more-permissive ValidBooleanFalse in Culture tasks

Before, we were explicitly comparing to 'false', but usually MSBuild
allows alternate spellings, which we can pretty easily support here.
